main event: Two white lights were observed back and forth for 15 minutes in Beverly, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on November 14, 1957, and lasted for fifteen minutes,The observers were a young boy and a student,The lights were seen side by side and were described as being small funnels with a diameter of one foot,The course of the objects was reported to be back and forth,The weather conditions were low overcast with visibility of 12 miles.
witness description: a young boy and a student
